actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to provide preferential quota treatment on imported products assembled or processed from articles grown, produced or manufactured in the United States.
short_title: United States Product Integration Incentive Act of 1985

summary.text: United States Product Integration Incentive Act of 1985 - Prohibits any quantity limitation on products to that portion of the product assembled or processed from articles grown, produced, or manufactured in the United States. Provides that this Act shall not constitute a modification to category quotas designated for countries participating in bilateral agreements with the United States pursuant to the Multi-Fiber Arrangement for textiles and textile products, except for the prohibition contained within this Act.

titles.title: United States Product Integration Incentive Act of 1985
A bill to provide preferential quota treatment on imported products assembled or processed from articles grown, produced or manufactured in the United States.
